text: Ani smarana kara, jevha amhi jinnanca eka samuha tumacyakade valavila, yasathi ki tyanni kura'ana aikave, tara jevha te paigambaranjavala pohacale, tevha (ekamekanna) mhanu lagale ki gappa raha. Maga jevha pathana samapta jhale tevha apalya janasamuhacya lokanna khabaradara karanyakarita paratale
